title: Sammys.Adventure.A.Turtles.Tale.2010.PROPER.1080p.x264.DTS.Shado
description:
So I looked all over the place for a 1080p copy of this with English sound. When I finally found it I was just disappointed to hear that it was British English, so I found the American English DVD and ripped the DTS audio from it. This is now the PROPER, as last release had issues with the sound. I also re-synced and edited the subtitles to match the American English version. This release has American English sound, with subtitles, and a Polish language track for my peoples. Hope you enjoy and seed if you download:)
